mapper.select: SELECT U.NICKNAME nickName, F.CONTENT content, F.CREATED_DATE createdDate FROM FEED F JOIN FINAL FN ON F.FINAL_NO = FN.FINAL_NO JOIN FIRST_CK FC ON FN.FIRST_CK_NO = FC.FIRST_CK_NO JOIN APPLY A ON FC.APPLY_NO = A.APPLY_NO JOIN USERS U ON A.PIN_NO = U.PIN_NO WHERE F.FINAL_NO IN ('FN1', 'FN2', 'FN3') ORDER BY F.CREATED_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEED(FEED_NO, FINAL_NO, CONTENT, CREATED_DATE) VALUES(FEEDNOSEQ.NEXTVAL , 'FN1' , #{content} , SYSDATE)
